divs: Sighting DetailsI got ny camcorder out to focus on the overcast early in the morning. I saw anobject pulsating between a wite and blue glow. It looked to be in the upperatmosphere. It was southwest of my third story condo. I thought it could havebeen a sattelite, but it phased in and out sometimes. It was 425 on the morningof November, the 13th, 2002. Later I lost sight of the object and went to bed.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around November 13th 2002
